Package com.servingxml.util.record

Provides interfaces and classes for record sets.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FieldType  
Record A Record class represents a set of fields.
RecordReceiver  
RecordType A representation of the type of a record.
Value  
ValueType

RecordContentHandler  
RecordGroupingXmlReader A RecordGroupingXmlReader implement a SAX 2 XMLReader interface for supplying record field values as SAX events.
RecordImpl A RecordImpl class represents a set of record.
RecordTypeBuilder A RecordTypeBuilder class builds a record.
RecordTypeImpl A RecordTypeImpl class implements a RecordType.

Provides interfaces and classes for record sets.
